nodes.text: R4-C4 was an astromech droid that served during the time of the Clone Wars. A unit with a "flower pot"–shaped head almost as tall as its body, the droid was fitted with extra processing power to calculate hyperspace coordinates.
R4-C4 appears briefly in "Evil Plans" during the scene in which the protocol droid C-3PO is negotiating a price for jogan fruit with the Khramboan vendor Droogan.
